document.full_text: serbia may send ratko mladic to face genocide charges in the hague within four days, a justice official said on monday, despite rallies by nationalists angry at the bosnian serb general's capture after 16 years on the run.
document.title: mladic could be sent to war crimes court in days
lines_and_colors: serbia may send ratko mladic to face genocide charges in the hague within four days, a justice official said on monday, despite rallies by nationalists angry at the bosnian serb general's capture after 16 years on the run.
